intro: Emma finds a shiny egg and from it hatches Spyke, a purple dragon with whom she will live a great adventure to save a magical world hidden underground.
description:
Emma and Her Little Dragon is a magical and exciting visual novel for adventurous kids.

Emma and her inseparable friend Mia delve into breathing tunnels, whispering forests, and singing caves, accompanied by Spyke, a small purple dragon who holds the secret to saving Hollow Earth, a kingdom hidden beneath the earth.

As the mysterious Men in Suits try to steal the magic to make themselves rich, Emma will discover that true strength lies in trust, friendship, and a brave heart.

What you'll find inside:

A great fantasy and adventure story full of excitement.

An adorable dragon who will be readers' best friend.

Magical and spectacular full-color illustrations.

Secret worlds with luminous creatures and impossible landscapes.

A tender message about friendship and trust that inspires little ones.

A perfect read to let your imagination run wild, laugh, get excited, and discover that even the smallest friendship can open the door to a whole world.
